dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: Bonjour, t'es la nouvelle recrue ? Je te souhaite la bienvenue !

dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: J'imagine que tu es venu pour mon Escape Game, pas vrai ? Je l'ai monté moi-même, j'en suis plutôt fière.

dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: Cet Escape Game parlera d'un sujet sérieux : Le harcèlement sexuel en entreprise. En jouant à ce jeu, tu apprendras la différence entre une agression, un harcèlement ou de la drague.

dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: Tu apprendras aussi les conséquences d'un incident, et les actions à prendre si tu assistes à ce genre de situation.

dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: Pour gagner, c'est très simple : Lorsque tu entreras dans une chambre, tu seras confronter à une situation fictive, généré par intelligence artificielle. Réponds avec la bonne action à faire afin de pouvoir continuer !

dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: Attention, si ton score est vraiment mauvais, je serais obligée d'en parler à la RH et de te virer...

dialog.speaker: Alice
dialog.message: Roh allez, je rigole ! Juste réfléchis bien à tes réponses et tout se passera bien ! Allez, c'est parti !

situations.scenario: Alice overhears a colleague making an inappropriate comment about another team member's appearance. What should she do?

responses.text: Report the incident to a manager or HR, or confront the colleague if she feels safe doing so.
Ignore the situation, assuming it's just a one-time occurrence.
Laugh along to avoid any awkwardness.
Tell other colleagues about the comment to gauge their reactions.

situations.scenario: John witnesses an intern being belittled by a senior staff member. What should he do?

responses.text: Intervene if safe, and report the incident to HR or a manager immediately.
Stay out of it since he is not directly involved.
Confront the senior staff member aggressively.
Gossip about the situation with other colleagues.

situations.scenario: Bob sees a group of colleagues isolating and ignoring a new team member during lunch breaks. Why should he intervene?

responses.text: Creating an inclusive environment is everyone’s responsibility and intervening can help prevent potential harassment or bullying.
The new team member probably prefers to be alone.
He should join in isolating the new member to fit in with the group.

situations.scenario: Emily witnesses a colleague being persistently interrupted and spoken over during meetings. What should she do?

responses.text: Support the colleague by acknowledging their points, and address the issue with the interrupters, either in the moment or privately afterwards.
Stay silent and avoid getting involved.
Start interrupting others as well to fit in.
Tell the interrupted colleague they should just speak up more.
